first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=0}] run tag @s add sentinel.false

commands: execute at @a run particle block minecraft:dirt ~ ~ ~ 5 2 5 0.1 100 force
execute as @e[tag=!striker.ground.drill,distance=..8] run effect give @s slowness 1 2 true
last_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.break=1}] run fill ~-2 ~-1 ~-2 ~2 ~-5 ~2 minecraft:air destroy

commands: execute at @a run particle block minecraft:dirt ~ ~ ~ 5 2 5 0.1 100 force
execute as @e[tag=!striker.ground.attack,distance=..6] run effect give @s slowness 6 2 true
last_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.break=1}] run fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-2 ~1 ~-2 ~2 minecraft:air destroy
